name: Calamity Remnant
desc: Each time 1 Skill Point is consumed or overflowed, all allies gain 1 stack of "Honeydew," up to 10 stack(s). After a character uses an attack, they consume all their "Honeydew" stacks. For each stack consumed, deals Additional DMG equal to 80% Max HP. This attack is considered as Basic ATK DMG.
